subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Philadelphia Phillies answered the Mets’ recent flurry of bullpen improvements by agreeing on Friday to a three-year, $31.5 million contract with outfielder Raúl Ibáñez.
snippet: The Philadelphia Phillies answered the Mets’ recent flurry of bullpen improvements by agreeing on Friday to a three-year, $31.5 million contract with outfielder Raúl Ibáñez.
